Container.Name: PhantomBot-1
Container.Overview:
PhantomBot is a Twitch chat bot powered by Java. PhantomBot has many modern features out of the box such as a built-in webpanel, enhanced moderation, games, a point system, raffles, custom commands, a music player, and more. PhantomBot can also be integrated with many services such as Discord, Twitter, TipeeeStream, StreamLabs and StreamElements!
Additional functionality is enabled through the use of third-party modules.
AFTER First launch go to your /mnt/user/appdata/phantomboto/ create a files named botlogin.txt relaunch the docker and after that remove everything under HTTPS

Config.Name: UserPassword
Config.Description: password for the User in the Panel

Config.Name: HTTPS
Config.Description: Did you use HTTPS for connect in the panel ?

Config.Name: BotName
Config.Description: The name of your bot on twitch

Config.Name: BotKey
Config.Description: The keyAPI of the bot grab it here https://phantombot.github.io/PhantomBot/oauth/
